unnormalised: Yo, Influencers, Listen Up! Ditch the Guesswork!
normalised: Yo, Influencers, Listen Up! Ditch the Guesswork!

unnormalised: Ever wondered if your Insta reels are *actually* hitting the right folks, or if all those dance videos are just echoing in empty cyberspace? Say hello to pumped-up follower analytics!
normalised: Ever wondered if your Insta reels are actually hitting the right folks, or if all those dance videos are just echoing in empty cyberspace? Say hello to pumped-up follower analytics!

unnormalised: New tools are giving you super-detailed insights into who's watching, when they're watching (peak engagement is apparently between 7 PM and 9 PM, BTW!), and what kinda content *really* gets them hyped. Think demographic data, interest categories, even location down to the 'mohallas' of Mumbai and Delhi!
normalised: New tools are giving you super-detailed insights into who's watching, when they're watching (peak engagement is apparently between seven P M and nine P M, by the way!), and what kind of content really gets them hyped. Think demographic data, interest categories, even location down to the mohallas of Mumbai and Delhi!

unnormalised: Forget blindly posting selfies from Goa hoping for likes. With these analytics, you can tailor content to specifically target, say, Gen Z college students in Bangalore who love chai and Bollywood.
normalised: Forget blindly posting selfies from Goa hoping for likes. With these analytics, you can tailor content to specifically target, say, G E N Z college students in Bangalore who love chai and Bollywood.

unnormalised: Heard that Pooja Sharma tripled her sponsorship deals after diving deep into her analytics? Thatâ€™s the power!
normalised: Heard that Pooja Sharma tripled her sponsorship deals after diving deep into her analytics? That's the power!

unnormalised: Data is the new 'desi ghee' for growth. The next seminar on this is happening on 26/01/2024 at IIM Ahmedabad. Sign up by 10/10/2023 at 11:00 hrs!
normalised: Data is the new desi ghee for growth. The next seminar on this is happening on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four at I I M Ahmedabad. Sign up by tenth October two thousand and twenty three at eleven hundred hours!

unnormalised: So, log in, explore those dashboards, and start creating content that resonates. Your bank account will thank you later! Rs. 1000 well spent to understand your audience!
normalised: So, log in, explore those dashboards, and start creating content that resonates. Your bank account will thank you later! rupees one thousand well spent to understand your audience!
